column5: It,s that time of year all. Time for greetings and festives and yes,drinks. Be safe out there. Call a cab or a friend or yer husband/wife, for a ride.    BEEN THERE DONE THAT

Brians right.Every year someones Christmas is ruined by drinking related accidents.Be safe,drink responsibly, and take advantage of all the free ride services in your area.Don't become another statistic this year
